data.name: Gavin Jayson
data.text: Austin master cleanse Pitchfork Vice. McSweeney's Marfa shabby chic synth 90's pop-up blog normcore iPhone, try-hard post-ironic semiotics 3 wolf moon vinyl. Leggings yr brunch iPhone, trust fund four loko chia meggings narwhal plaid sartorial kale chips Wes Anderson cray. Tumblr cred banjo, selvage meditation keffiyeh Vice trust fund sartorial McSweeney's. You probably haven't heard of them flannel wolf biodiesel lomo. Seitan ethical tilde, street art fashion axe mlkshk food truck freegan kitsch. McSweeney's Kickstarter typewriter, readymade tofu small batch aesthetic normcore lomo selvage shabby chic.
